text:
Many of you know of the product we're building at <https://plato.io|Plato>.  We're building a low-code platform for internal tools, based on what we think is the key technique for democratizing computing - <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Programming_by_example|Programming by Example>.  There's a ton of promising products that use this technique, from Excel macros to OSX macros to RPA.  Plato is perfecting it for web apps.

We're hiring our first designer to help us build the many novel interaction patterns we need.  If you know someone great, I can offer a $10K referral bonus in cash or equity: <https://jobs.plato.io/founding-designer-at-plato>

I'd also love to chit chat with anyone interested in our approach! DM me!

attachments.text: As children we discovered that clay can be shaped into any form simply by shoving both hands into the stuff. Most of us have learned no such thing about the computer. — Alan Kay
